channel.title: projects on Background Process
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Background Process

item.title: A Golang implementation of PasswordSafe V3, ready for Beta
item.author: tim@backgroundprocess.com (Tim Kuhlman)
item.description: The password database I have been implementing in go is ready for Beta! The DB is implemented using the password safe version 3 database spec. Enough of the features for this are now working that 0.3.0 release is ready for others to test.

item.title: Weechat Command Queues
item.author: tim@backgroundprocess.com (Tim Kuhlman)
item.description: I use weechat for much of the day and have issue regular repetitive commands periodically. If you are in the same situation you may find the queue plugin I recently modified to be useful.

item.title: Launchpad Merge Proposal Helper Script
item.author: tim@backgroundprocess.com (Tim Kuhlman)
item.description: I’ve written a script to aid in merge proposals done with Launchpad. Simply run the command with the url of the merge proposal as the argument and the script will
